scripts.start-dev: cd prisma && npx prisma generate && cd ../idi-app && pnpm i && pnpm dev
scripts.start-dev-backend: cd prisma && npx prisma generate && cd ../server && pnpm i && pnpm dev
scripts.create-migration: dotenv -e .env -- cd prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.build-app: cd prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && cd ../idi-app && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.build-backend: cd prisma && && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && cd ../server && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.start-backend: cd server && pnpm i && pnpm start:prod
